function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Visiting friends or family over the age of 75 on a regular basis","category":"Structure","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Survey participation excluding individuals who failed the attention check","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for non-compliance with pandemic measures due to perceptions of procedural fairness and justice","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Influence of political orientation on compliance with covid-19 measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Perception of limited choice leading to compliance out of coercion and fear","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unclear rules leading to non-compliant behavior","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Influence of descriptive social norm on compliance","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Obligation to obey the law and procedural justice influencing compliance","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Non-compliance due to high costs","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Non-compliance due to strain and negative emotions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Non-compliance due to deterrent effect of measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Non-compliance due to lack of capacity to comply","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to comply with social distancing and staying at home measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of substantive moral support for the measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of compliance with mitigation measures such as staying home and social distancing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Disregard for the risk to vulnerable populations when not following guidelines","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ignoring the possibility of a new spike in cases by easing up with measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Trust in science predicts compliance with covid-19 measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Fear of covid-19 associated with increased compliance","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Economic endowments influence compliance with stay-at-home measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Variation in compliance globally","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Influence of personality characteristics on willingness to accept restrictions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Association of political orientation with compliance","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Rapid spread of the sars-cov-2 virus globally","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of treatment or vaccine for sars-cov-2","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Effectiveness of communication in generating desirable behavior","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of data on the health status of employees","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and training on hygiene and disease prevention","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and indoor air quality","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of access requirements explicitly mentioned for policy measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Identification of non-unique policy measures in different media reports","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Existential threat to companies in case of prolonged sales decline","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Retrieving 536 media reports from the database nexis could expose individuals to potentially contagious diseases if the database was accessed in a high-risk environment.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Analyzing 152 articles for policy measures could pose a risk of exposure to contagious diseases if the analysis is conducted in a high-risk environment.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Testing interrater reliability and refining criteria among researchers could increase the risk of disease transmission in case of close collaboration in a high-risk environment.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unsanitary interview conditions may promote the spread of contagious diseases","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Close proximity during interviews may increase the risk of disease transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Extended data collection process may expose interviewees and interviewers to multiple sources of contagion","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases during in-person interviews and meetings","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of funding for future research on the impact of contagious diseases","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate preparation for future economic crises related to contagious diseases","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of support for startups and entrepreneurial ecosystems during the covid-19 crisis","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exchange of information in online crisis groups could lead to the spread of misinformation and incorrect advice regarding disease management.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Communicating intention for startup specific support early may lead to the gathering of large groups of individuals in physical spaces, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decrease specific barriers for startups may lead to relaxed regulations and oversight, potentially compromising public health and safety standards.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Perception of entrepreneurial opportunity during crisis","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Adversity and coping strategies in startups","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Barriers in policy support services for startups","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid spread of covid-19 pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate relief measures for entrepreneurs","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"}]}
